task_summary: Pick and place the red square block onto the table surface and release it safely.

task_long_description.overview: A UR-style manipulator interacts with several tabletop objects (red square block on the right, green bottle, soda can, orange figurine, and a clear cube). The goal is to grasp the red square and place it down on the table. The behavior emphasizes reliable perception, stable grasping, gentle placement with minimal force, and a short retreat for clearance after release.
preconditions: Robot is homed and within reach of the red square.
Table surface is clear at the intended placement spot.
stepwise_plan: Detect the red square and pre-open the gripper.
Move above the red square and compute a top grasp pose.
Execute the grasp and verify stability.
Slightly raise the object to clear the surface.
Place the object on the table with low press force and release.
success_criteria: Red square is resting stably on the table surface.
No object collisions beyond intended contact.
Gripper fully released and robot retreated.
failure_and_recovery: If grasp is unstable, reopen gripper and recompute grasp pose.
If placement contact not detected, lower further or adjust pose.
task_long_description.termination: Terminate once the object is placed on the table, gripper opened, and the arm has retreated.

frame_3.now_evidence: End-effector is closely aligned with the red square at the right edge, consistent with imminent grasp/placement action.
frame_3.predicts_next: Suggests grasp execution followed by lifting and placement.

node_specs.description: Perceive the red square to localize it.
Move to a safe height above target.
Lift object slightly to clear surface.
Place object on table with light force.

failure_modes: Object not detected due to occlusion or lighting.
recovery_strategy: Recompute grasp and retry after reopening gripper.
Select a nearby clear spot on the table and re-place.
assumptions: The red square is graspable with a top pinch.
Placement location is on the table near the right side, matching the frames.
Instruction aligns with observed frames; no conflict detected.

expected_success_criteria: Red square ends upright/flat on the table and is no longer in the gripper.
Robot retreats without contacting other objects.
